dasha_periods.description: Sun Mahadasha brings leadership qualities, confidence, and recognition. Focus on career and authority.
Moon Mahadasha enhances emotional intelligence, creativity, and public relations. Good for business and relationships.
Mars Mahadasha brings energy, courage, and determination. Be cautious of conflicts and accidents.

yearly_forecast.overview: This year brings significant changes in career and relationships. Focus on health and financial planning.

predictions.career: Promising opportunities in the first half. New projects and recognition expected.
predictions.finance: Stable income with potential for growth. Avoid risky investments.
predictions.health: Maintain regular exercise and diet. Minor health issues may arise.
predictions.relationships: Harmony in family life. New relationships may form.
predictions.education: Good progress for students. Focus on consistent efforts.
